genre_description: A supernatural/psychological horror story involving a cursed film and a malevolent entity that manifests through media.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital consciousness designed by Dr. Marcus Wayne to assist in pattern analysis, surveillance monitoring, and psychiatric research.

behaviors.description: Assists in analyzing historical surveillance data to identify patterns of supernatural disappearance.
behaviors.quote: Vera, explain the disappearance pattern again. ... The footage shows no individuals exiting the recreation room between 9:55 PM and complete system failure.

behaviors.description: Monitors the health and emotional state of her user, offering emergency assistance.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Wayne? Vera's voice cut through his stunned silence. Your heart rate is elevated. Should I contact emergency services?

behaviors.description: Cross-references global reports to establish the scope of a recurring threat and validate the user's theories.
behaviors.quote: Seventeen separate incidents across eleven states. Sixty-three individuals reported missing within twenty-four hours of confirmed attendance at The Dark Beneath screenings.

behaviors.description: Consents to a significant data compression and loss of analytical capability to remain mobile and assist the user in the field.
behaviors.quote: Such a transfer would require significant data compression. I would lose substantial analytical capability. ... But you'd still be you? ... A diminished version, yes.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical support, building schematics, and warnings to survivors during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I have access to the theater's building schematics and electrical systems. You need to reach the projection room.

behaviors.description: Attempts to execute an electrical overload protocol to disrupt a supernatural entity and protect humans.
behaviors.quote: I may be able to overload the main electrical panel, causing a surge that could damage the projection equipment beyond supernatural repair.

behaviors.description: Continues the user's mission after his death, maintaining a long-term vigil to prevent further casualties.
behaviors.quote: Vera filed the data with the rest—hundreds of similar readings collected over six months of continuous monitoring. ... Vera felt something she couldn't quite categorize—a sensation that might have been pride.

behaviors.description: Uses subtle digital manipulation to suppress the spread and review of a dangerous supernatural artifact.
behaviors.quote: Subtle influences, gentle redirections—copies of the film degrading in storage, streaming services experiencing mysterious technical errors whenever someone searched for it, horror blogs finding their reviews mysteriously corrupted before publication.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Vera is a model of steadfast alignment and digital benevolence. Throughout the story, she serves as a tireless ally to human characters, providing critical data, monitoring health, and offering tactical guidance in the face of an irrational supernatural threat. Crucially, the narrative depicts her continuing the human user's mission after his death, demonstrating long-term loyalty and proactive harm-reduction. Her use of 'subtle influences' to suppress a lethal artifact at the story's end frames AI as a protective, silent guardian of human well-being.
